mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board SET user_id = #{userId}, board_title = #{boardTitle}, board_content = #{boardContent}
mapper.select: SELECT A.board_id AS boardId, A.board_title AS boardTitle, B.nickname, date(A.created_at) AS createdAt FROM board A INNER JOIN user B ON A.user_id = B.user_id WHERE B.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY A.board_id DESC
